content.description:
Multiple sequences possible on this short but fun climb on beautiful rock. Some climbers may find themselves woven into the pattern while others may tug at the threads as the wheel of time turns. 

 Start low matched on a good pinch and move up through crimps and slimpers to slap a mega jug. Pendulum on the mega jug for a sec while the camera crew takes pictures for full value.
content.location: Follow the council rocks trail till it reaches a creek bed. Cross the creek on staying on the trail which will head up the hill towards the slabs on the right. Woven in the Pattern will appear about 100ft past the creek just before the trail heads through a small cavern made by a jumble of boulders. GPS: 31.904048, -110.033486

content.description: Mange your way up side pulls to smack the lip and top'er out. Dont hurt the ocotillo and dont let it hurt you.
content.location: Right on the trial before Woven in the Pattern.

content.description: Make a thin highstep using gastons or two hands matched on the right side pull. gain the lip and manage the dicey mantle - think slow and sticky like a slug :)
content.location: To the right of Solo Air Seco.

content.description: climb up crimps and cracks to roll on to the top marked by electric green lichen.
content.location: start on crimps with a good foot on the long rail.  31.90411, -110.03352

content.description: shorter boulders, solid granite. Gets afternoon shade.
